description: List maintenance requirement parts with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Allowed when the user can view the related maintenance requirement parts per MaintenanceRequirementPartPolicy scope: admins; managers for a broker can view all parts; technicians can view all non-template parts and template parts for their broker; general business unit members can view template parts for their broker and parts on assigned requirements; operations members (including operations-with-manager-business-unit) can view non-template parts with equipment in accessible business units, and operations-with-manager-business-unit cannot view template parts.

flags.name: --maintenance-requirement-part
flags.description: Filter by maintenance requirement part ID
